name: radial-timeline
description: A manuscript timeline for creative fiction writing projects that displays scenes organized by act, subplot, and chronological order in a radial format for a comprehensive view of project.

scripts.build-only: node show-scripts.mjs && npx tsc --noEmit && node code-quality-check.mjs src/main.ts --quiet && node check-css-duplicates.mjs --quiet && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.backup: node check-css-duplicates.mjs && npm run build-only && BACKUP_NOTE="${npm_config_note:-$npm_config_message}" node backup.mjs
scripts.standards: node scripts/compliance-check.mjs && node code-quality-check.mjs src/main.ts && node check-css-duplicates.mjs

author: Eric Rhys Taylor
